title: (x) svedka vodka's - Arial Narrow {Adriano, Yves}
content:
Anyone know this font??   
Here's a sample:   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20354.jpg)   
   
Thanks

 [‹ Unknown geometric bauhaus-type font!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133809/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2030 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Porsche Carrera font - custom {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133809/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2038 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: The No. 2 is not a helvetica 2.
Heh. Good one Adriano. This time you beat me. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

The 'a', 't', '2' are pretty Arial-ish ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
I think when I finally get to designing a font, it'll have a 'Squooshed' style, in honour of Ms. Wardle and Typophile. :D

i check it. Very Very close. But the apostrophe doesn't match....   
:o(
Wanda why don't you register and join the party?

Yeah, that's right. You've been here a couple of times   
now, so you must've noticed we don't bite! ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411133809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)
So Wanda you in Manhattan too? Hudson and Jane St.
